main event: Several witnesses observed a disc-shaped object hovering silently over North Forrestville, Maryland on October 6, 1968.
interesting points: The object was described as approximately 30-40 feet in diameter with a bright reddish-orange glow., The object made no sound while hovering for several minutes., It suddenly accelerated rapidly and disappeared from sight., Photographic evidence confirmed the object's physical presence, indicating it was not a conventional phenomenon., The incident remains classified as an unresolved unidentified flying object under Project Blue Book.
sighted object: a disc-shaped object emitting a bright light
witness description: local residents including Mr. John Smith
